provenance.placeName: Komárom, 50 m from the legionary fortress

encodingDesc.p: Marked-up according to the EpiDoc Guidelines

profileDesc.creation: EAGLE - Europeana Network of Ancient Greek and Latin Epigraphy

div.head: Text
div.ab:
Dis Manibus
Titus Flavius Iulianus quondam |(centurio) legionis I adiutricis
piae fidelis annorum LXVIII Titus Flavius Iulianus
et Flavia Iulia filii patri carissimo
adque pientissimo
optamus sit tibi terra levis

div.p: A halotti árnyaknak. Titus Flavius Iulianus, a legio I Adiutrix Pia Fidelis egykori századosa, élt 68 évet. Titus Flavius Iulianus és Flavia Iulia, a gyermekei (állították) igen drága és igen jámbor atyjuknak. Kívánjuk, hogy legyen neked könnyű a föld.

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported license.

provenance.placeName: Komárom, southwards from the legionary fortress

encodingDesc.p: Marked-up according to the EpiDoc Guidelines

profileDesc.creation: EAGLE - Europeana Network of Ancient Greek and Latin Epigraphy

div.ab:
Septimius Messor veteranus Ael(iae) Magnillae co
niugi annorum L Sepptimiis Messorino
et Primo filiis bene merentibus

div.p: A halotti árnyaknak. Septimius Messor, kiszolgált katona (állította) feleségének, Aelia Magnillának, aki 50évet élt, és érdemekben gazdagon elhunyt fiainak, Lucius Septimius Messorinusnak és Lucius Septimius Primusnak.

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported license.

provenance.placeName: Komárom, westward fom the legionary fortress

encodingDesc.p: Marked-up according to the EpiDoc Guidelines

profileDesc.creation: EAGLE - Europeana Network of Ancient Greek and Latin Epigraphy

div.head: Text
div.ab:
Dis Manibus
Valeriae Valentinae
quae vixit annos XXVII
Ulpia Sabina mater
faciendum curavit

div.p: A halotti árnyaknak. Valeria Valentinának, aki 27 évet élt, Ulpia Sabina, az anyja állíttatta a síremléket.

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported license.

provenance.placeName: Komárom, southwards from the legionary fortress

encodingDesc.p: Marked-up according to the EpiDoc Guidelines

profileDesc.creation: EAGLE - Europeana Network of Ancient Greek and Latin Epigraphy

div.head: Text
div.ab:
Dis Manibus
Iuliae Ursulae Marci Digni Ursu
lus Iustus et Valentinus mat
ri pientissimae ex testamento fi
eri praecepit sic per Iulium Avitum
libertum

div.p: Iulia Ursula, Marcus Dignus lánya halotti árnyainak. Ursulus Iustus és (Ursulus) Valentinus az igen kötelességtudó anyának. (A síremlék) felépítését Iulius Avitus nevű szabados által végrendeleti úton rendelte el.

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported license.

provenance.placeName: Komárom, southwards from the legionary fortress

encodingDesc.p: Marked-up according to the EpiDoc Guidelines

profileDesc.creation: EAGLE - Europeana Network of Ancient Greek and Latin Epigraphy

div.head: Text
div.ab:
Petroniae Severinae
innocentissimae puellae
quae vixit annos XIII
Caius Petronius Nundinus Augustalis municipii
Brigetionensium pater filiae dulcis
simae faciendum curavit

div.p: Petronia Severinának, az igen feddhetetlen leánynak, aki 13 évet élt. Apja, Caius Petronius Nu<n?>dinus, Brigetio municipiumának augustalisa állíttatta a síremléket az igen édes leánygyermekének.

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported license.

provenance.placeName: Komárom, between the legionary fortress and Szőny

encodingDesc.p: Marked-up according to the EpiDoc Guidelines

profileDesc.creation: EAGLE - Europeana Network of Ancient Greek and Latin Epigraphy

div.ab:
Lucio Retonio Lucio quondam primo pilo legionis I adiutricis
qui vixit annos LXXVIII stipendiorum LVIII
Retoni Romanus et Saturninus
et Lucilla fili fecerunt

div.p: A halotti árnyaknak. Lucius Retonius Luciusnak, a legio I Adiutrix egykori elsőlándzsásának, aki 78 évet élt, és 58 évet szolgált. Retonius Romanus és (Retonius) Saturninus, valamint Lucilla, a gyermekei állíttatták (a síremléket).

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported license.

provenance.placeName: Komárom, southwards from the legionary fortress

encodingDesc.p: Marked-up according to the EpiDoc Guidelines

profileDesc.creation: EAGLE - Europeana Network of Ancient Greek and Latin Epigraphy

div.ab:
Valerius Valerius frater sic
Aurelio Basso Abbosatis
filio qui vixit annos XXVII
Aurelius Iulianus proximus
eius
faciendum curavit

div.p: A halotti árnyaknak. Valerius Corifus emlékére Valerius Valerius, a testvére (állította). Aurelius Bassusnak, Abbosas fiának, aki 27 évet élt, Aurelius Iulianus, a legközelebbi hozzátartozója állíttatta (a síremléket).

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported license.

provenance.placeName: Komárom, southwards from the legionary fortress

encodingDesc.p: Marked-up according to the EpiDoc Guidelines

profileDesc.creation: EAGLE - Europeana Network of Ancient Greek and Latin Epigraphy

div.head: Text
div.ab:
Dis Manibus
Caio Iulio Candidiano
qui vixit annos XVIII
menses VII omnibus
studiis liberalibus
erudito Iulius Cres
cens filio karissim
mo sic et Caecilia Marcellina
faciendum curaverunt

div.p: A halotti árnyaknak. Caius Iulius Candidianusnak, aki 18 évet, 7 hónapot élt, és jártas az összes szabad tudományban. Iulius Crescens igen drága fiának és Caecilia Marcellina állíttatták (a síremléket).

titleStmt.title: sarcophagus of M. Aurelius Verus Forensis

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported license.

provenance.placeName: Komárom, southwards from the legionary fortress

encodingDesc.p: Marked-up according to the EpiDoc Guidelines

profileDesc.creation: EAGLE - Europeana Network of Ancient Greek and Latin Epigraphy

div.head: Text
div.ab:
Dis Manibus Marco Aurelio Vero
Forensi qui
vixit ann
is XXXIII
Aurelia
Verina
fratri
karissimo
faciendum curavit

div.p: A halotti árnyaknak. Marcus Aurelius Verus Forensisnek, aki 32 évet élt. Aurelia Verina állíttatta (a síremléket) igen dárga fivérének.

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported license.

encodingDesc.p: Marked-up according to the EpiDoc Guidelines

profileDesc.creation: EAGLE - Europeana Network of Ancient Greek and Latin Epigraphy

div.head: Text
div.ab:
Tito Flavio Titiano qui et Eus
ebius annorum VIII
Titus Flavius Maturus beneficiarius
legati et Aviania
Castilla paren
tes filio rarissimo

div.p: A 8 évet élt Titus Flavius Titianusnak, akit Eusebiusnak is hívtak. Titus Flavius Maturus, a legioparancsnok beneficiariusa és Aviania Castilla, a szülők, igen rendkívüli fiuknak.

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported license.

provenance.placeName: Komárom, southwards from the legionary fortress

encodingDesc.p: Marked-up according to the EpiDoc Guidelines

profileDesc.creation: EAGLE - Europeana Network of Ancient Greek and Latin Epigraphy

div.head: Text
div.ab:
Iovi Optimo Maximo
Brigaetionenses sic
publice deerunt dedicaverunt

div.p: Iuppiter Optimus Maximusnak a brigetióiak nyilvánosan (vagy: közpénzből) adományozták és felajánlották.
